Title: Malice
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (story), Jonas McCord (story), Aaron Sorkin (screenplay), Scott Frank (screenplay)
Actors: Alec Baldwin, Nicole Kidman, Bill Pullman, Bebe Neuwirth
Plot: A tale about a happily married couple who would like to have children. Tracy teaches children, Andy's a college professor. Things are never the same after she is taken to hospital and operated upon by Jed, a "know it all" doctor.
Production: Castle Rock Entertainment, Nelvana, New Line Cinema
